text: I have not done a Q&A in a while so I

been shattered since you started
traveling overall people are good
especially right now with all the crap

they're just bad people out to destroy
others and that's just not the case
there are bad people and there are good
people doesn't matter your religion
doesn't matter what country you come
from that's just it bad people good
people but generally people are good and
this leads me actually into something
I've been wanting to say in a video for
a long time because I've gotten this
question by several of you are you
afraid to travel with everything

have you ever thought of stopping
traveling because of what's going on and
my answer is absolutely not if I stop
traveling then the bad guys win in fact
I don't think we should stop traveling I
think we should all be traveling more I
think that we need to travel in order to
understand what is happening and not
just what's portrayed by the media
because what they show you in the media
is all these horrible things and it's on
VP and it's on all over social media and
it's like it's in some someone it's
brainwashing and it makes you doubt

the whole story I think it's important
for us to keep traveling to get to know

one culture or one religion on being the

that country in that religion there are
so many more good people that want good
things don't want everything we all want
they want family they won't love they
want freedom they want opportunities
